headline: Communities, Businesses, and NGOs Unite to Tackle Water Challenges for World Water Day 2025
summary: WASHINGTON, February 18, 2025--With 2.2 billion people lacking safe water, communities, businesses, and NGOs are taking bold action this World Water Day to accelerate solutions. From March 17-22, thousands of volunteers worldwide will mobilize to improve water security—through cleanups, education programs, and projects expanding access to safe water, sanitation, and hygiene (WASH).
